description:
Hasegawa was arrested when he is mistaken for a molester. Haga, the man who appears before him is claims to be Hatsu`s lover. Furthermore, he is a skilled prosecutor and is defending the victim in the molestation trial. Haga uses the situation to his advantage and tells Hasegawa that he`ll let him be found innocent if he divorces Hatsu, but that he`ll make sure he`s guilty if he doesn`t. Hasegawa loses all hope in life and is completely crushed. But Gintoki cheers him up, and Hasegawa becomes determined to fight Haga until the end.
Source: crunchyroll
